QuestData.Title: Deploy the Shake-n-Quake!
QuestData.Description: Behold, the machine that will save us from the Nerubian threat!$B$B<Abner beams with pride as he presents the finished bot.>$B$BTake this remote control with you, and go out to the southernmost of the Nerubian sinkholes in the Geyser Fields. Use the remote to activate the Shake-n-Quake 5000. It will do the rest on its own.$B$BDon't be surprised if the quake it creates attracts the attention of a Nerubian leader. In fact, it would be a great opportunity to finish off the Nerubian offensive.
QuestData.LogDescription: Abner Fizzletorque at Fizzcrank Airstrip wants you to use the Shake-n-Quake 5000 to collapse the Nerubian tunnels and defeat Lord Kryxix.
QuestData.CompletionText: Well, have you deployed the Shake-n-Quake 5000 yet?
QuestData.RewardText: <Abner listens eagerly as you report your success and the success of the Shake-n-Quake 5000.>$B$BFizzcrank will be delighted to hear the news! And who knows, perhaps we'll make a mechanic of you yet!
